metadata.title: Algeria Eye ‚Äî Discover Algeria
metadata.description: Explore Algeria's 69 wilayas. Book hotels, restaurants, tours, and unique experiences across the country.

aboutPage.title: About Algeria Eye
aboutPage.subtitle: Your Smart Companion to Algeria's Hidden Gems

story.title: Our Vision
story.desc1: Algeria Eye isn't just a travel guide; it's a comprehensive digital ecosystem designed to revolutionize tourism in Algeria. Born from a desire to bridge the gap between Algeria's breathtaking landscapes and the world, we provide a seamless, personalized experience for every traveler.
story.desc2: From the golden sands of the Sahara to the azure Mediterranean coast, we combine advanced AI technology with human warmth to offer tailored itineraries, certified local guides, and instant bookings for hotels, transport, and events.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: To empower travelers with a smart, all-in-one platform that simplifies exploration. We aim to showcase Algeria's rich history, diverse culture, and stunning nature while providing practical solutions like transportation guidance, language translation, and secure accommodation bookings.

whatWeDo.title: What We Offer
whatWeDo.subtitle: A complete suite of services for the modern explorer.

guide.title: Smart Guidance
guide.desc: AI-driven recommendations and personalized itineraries based on your interests‚Äîwhether it's history, shopping, or nature.

connect.title: Local Connection
connect.desc: Direct access to certified tour guides who facilitate translation and cultural immersion.

logistics.title: Seamless Logistics
logistics.desc: Hassle-free booking for hotels, transport (car, bus, tram), and event organization.

events.title: Cultural Events
events.desc: Discover and participate in national exhibitions, festivals, and local competitions.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.desc: Deep dives into local culture, from food tasting to historical storytelling.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Leveraging technology to solve travel hurdles like language barriers and navigation.

hospitality.title: Hospitality
hospitality.desc: Ensuring every guest feels at home with 24/7 support and verified hosts.

join.title: Be Part of the Story
join.desc: Whether you are a traveler seeking adventure or a local business ready to welcome the world, Algeria Eye is your platform.

aboutPage.visionQuote: We bridge the gap between travelers and the rich cultural tapestry of Algeria. From booking luxury hotels to finding local guides for Sahara expeditions, we handle it all.
aboutPage.quote: We bridge the gap between travelers and the rich cultural tapestry of Algeria. From booking luxury hotels to finding local guides for Sahara expeditions, we handle it all.

hero.title: Discover the Beauty of Algeria
hero.subtitle: Journey from the golden Saharan dunes to the azure Mediterranean shores. Explore 69 unique wilayas through handpicked hotels, tours, and authentic local experiences.

wilayaDetails.seenByCreatorsSubtitle: Discover this wilaya through the lens of Algeria's top content creators

explore.title: Explore Algeria
explore.subtitle: Discover the rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine of the largest country in Africa.

culture.title: Algerian Culture & Traditions
culture.desc: A blend of Berber, Arab, French, and Mediterranean influences, Algerian culture is rich in music, literature, and hospitality.

fantasia.title: Fantasia (Tbourida)
fantasia.desc: A traditional equestrian performance simulating military assaults, often seen at weddings and festivals. Riders charge in a line and fire muskets simultaneously.

tea.title: The Tea Ceremony
tea.desc: Serving mint tea is a central part of hospitality. In the Sahara, the Tuareg people have a specific ritual involving three rounds of tea, each with a different flavor profile.

music.title: Music: Rai & Chaabi
music.description: Algeria's musical landscape is as diverse as its geography. Two genres stand out for their global impact and cultural depth: the rebellious Rai and the poetic Chaabi.

rai.title: Ra√Ø: The Voice of Youth
rai.desc: Born in Oran in the 1920s, Ra√Ø (meaning 'Opinion') began as a bedouin tradition before evolving into a rebellious fusion of folk, rock, and electronic music. It speaks of freedom, love, and social struggle. Icons like Cheb Khaled, Cheb Mami, and Cheb Hasni propelled it to the global stage, earning it UNESCO World Heritage status in 2022.

chaabi.title: Cha√¢bi: The Soul of the Casbah
chaabi.desc: Originating in the winding streets of the Casbah of Algiers in the early 20th century, Cha√¢bi is the music of the people. Characterized by the mandole and poetic lyrics (Melhoun) derived from Andalusian tradition, it creates an intimate atmosphere. Masters like El Hadj M'Hamed El Anka defined the genre, making it a staple of weddings and religious celebrations.

food.title: Taste of Algeria
food.desc: Mediterranean flavors meet African spices. Couscous, Tajine, and sweet honey pastries await.

couscous.title: Couscous
couscous.desc: The national dish, steamed semolina granules usually served with a stew of vegetables and meat.

chakhchoukha.title: Chakhchoukha
chakhchoukha.desc: A chaotic mix of torn flatbread pieces soaked in a spicy tomato sauce with chickpeas and meat.

mhajeb.title: Mhajeb
mhajeb.desc: Flaky, stuffed flatbread usually filled with a spicy onion and tomato mixture. A popular street food.

kelb.title: Kalb El Louz
kelb.desc: A semolina-based dessert soaked in syrup and rose water, meaning 'Heart of the Almond'.

history.title: Historical Landmarks
history.desc: From Roman ruins to Islamic architecture, Algeria's history spans millennia.

timgad.title: Timgad (Thamugadi)
timgad.desc: Known as the 'Pompeii of Africa', this Roman city in the Aur√®s Mountains is a UNESCO World Heritage site featuring a massive grid layout, library, and arch.

poste.title: Grande Poste d'Alger
poste.desc: A masterpiece of Neo-Moorish architecture built in 1910, serving as a symbol of Algiers center.

hammad.title: Al Qal'a of Beni Hammad
hammad.desc: The first capital of the Hammadid emirs, founded in 1007. It is home to one of the largest mosques in Algeria.

clothing.title: Traditional Attire
clothing.desc: A colorful display of heritage, varying significantly from region to region.

karakou.title: The Karakou
karakou.desc: Originating from Algiers, this consists of a velvet jacket embroidered with gold threads (Majboud) and usually worn with 'Seroual Chelqa' (traditional trousers).

chedda.title: Chedda of Tlemcen
chedda.desc: A UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage, this bridal dress from Tlemcen involves layers of fabric, jewelry, and a conical hat.

footer.description: Your gateway to discovering Algeria's hidden gems ‚Äî from Saharan oases to Mediterranean coastlines.
footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest travel tips and deals
